page.title: 08A WEEKEND IN MY LIFE
page.content:
with my friend until tea at 6.00.After tea I wander around a bit until it is time to go to bed. {Sunday:}I get up at 8.30 and{read}or make a cup of tea until breakfast.I go to church at 9.30 and the service lasts for an hour.After church I play in the garden until 12.00 when I can go and fetch the paper.We have our lunch at 1.00 and after lunch we often take our dog Daisy for a{walk}on the common for half an hour or so.We then come home and wait for tea after which I usually watch television until it is bedtime.
{Saturday:}I get up at about 7.00 and dress in jeans,T-shirt and sweatshirt before going downstairs for my breakfast of toast.After breakfast Iput my swimming costume and towel in a bag ready for my swimming lesson
